alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Pembina; Towner; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 04 at 9:09PM CDT until April 06 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches with locally higher snowfall totals. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce the visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard force winds will not occur during the entire time frame. However, whiteout conditions due to heavy falling snow may.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
